title: Digital Technologies Resources
description: A list of resources for teacheers

title: Integrating Coding and Maths in K-12: Research and Practice
type: Presentation from talk given at Google's CS Education Partner Summit in 2017
description: In this talk, I explained three projects that I had been involved in that had investigated the teaching of computational thinking and coding alongside Mathematics.

title: Digital Humanities Start-Up Pitch
type: A winning entry in the University of Newcastle's Centre for 21st Century Humanities startup competition in 2018
description: This is a video that I submitted to a competition ran by the Centre of 21st Century Humanities. The competition involved creating a pitch video for a Digital Humanities startup idea that had to be less than 1 minute.
